Suddenly the episode with Jeff's wife is interrupted by the presence of another giant entering the room-Jeff looks at the door as a giant grey humanoid looking creature came into the room with his eyes fixed on Haley.

"Haley-what' this I hear about you having special grass and not giving me any" he said in an annoyed voice. "Stop hogging it all and share!"

"Forget it Roger-there's none left" Haley snapped back hiding Jeff behind her back on the bed, but if you're not picky-I have some normal stuff in my backpack I was saving for later..." With that she left the room and disappeared leaving Roger in the room alone with Jeff.
1511112.title: Roger comes in

15111122.content:
Suddenly Roger's bored glaze alters as his eyes widen the then walks over to the bed each step as thunderous and frightening as Haley's had been.

"Oh, crap-he must see me-I've got to ruuu.." But before Jeff could run away-a giant long-fingered hand that made Haley's human giantess hand seem small enveloped the tiny man and brought Jeff to Roger's face.

"OMG-I can't believe it" he smirked "The special grass they were talking about was shrinking grass-we have some on my home planet but it's rare-I guess it's lucky for me I didn't have any-but not so lucky for you, huh? he sneered. With that-everything around him went dark as the enormous hand closed around Jeff and when the light returned he was in the attic (Roger's room) with the mischievous alien.
15111122.title: Rogers sees you

choices: Roger wants to play with the tiny human
Just kidding-Roger really wants to eat the tiny human
151111221.content:
Roger dropped Jeff and his bed and smiled down at the tiny human. "You know-Jeff I have a fantasy about being a in complete control and power over someone-it's my ultimate fantasy. I've always though you were kind of cute-but at this height-you're just so vulnerable and adorable" he laughed. With that the giant alien leaned over and extended his long snake-like tongue around Jeff coating him in slobber.

Jeff shrieked but then stopped as he realized the alien wasn't eating him but massaging him with the long warm tentacle of a tongue wrapping around him lifting him over Roger as the alien lied down on the bed. He then lowered Jeff onto his fat, but soft belly and retracted his tongue back into its cave.
151111221.title: Roger is a Dom

AMERICAN DAD GTS SHRINK
american dad is the property of fox
